text:
[Verse]
Round and round I go
Lost in a dream
Head up in the clouds
Chasing that gleam

[Verse 2]
Never looking back
Eyes on the night
Stars are guiding me
Into the light

[Chorus]
Spinning in circles
Losing control
Heartbeats in rhythm
Taking my soul

[Verse 3]
Colors flashing bright
Electric glow
Hands up to the sky
Letting it flow

[Chorus]
Spinning in circles
Losing control
Heartbeats in rhythm
Taking my soul

[Bridge]
Whisper in the wind
Calling me home
In this crazy world
I'm not alone
title: Spinning in Circles
